/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, including a towering skyscraper that stands out due to its unique curved shape. Other buildings, possibly residential or commercial, add to the urban landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. On the right side of the street, there's a construction site, indicating ongoing development in the area. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of modern architecture and natural elements in the cityscape.
